_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Six qualities of a mendicant that are go: Quick-witted when it comes to skillful teachings
Readily memorize the teachings they’ve heard
Examine the meaning of teachings they’ve memorized
Understanding the meaning and the teaching, they practice accordingly
Educate, encourage, fire up, and inspire their spiritual companions
Five qualities of a mendicant that are g: Not quick-witted when it comes to skillful teachings
Readily memorize the teachings they’ve heard
Examine the meaning of teachings they’ve memorized
Understanding the meaning and the teaching, they practice accordingly
Educate, encourage, fire up, and inspire their spiritual companions
Four qualities of a mendicant that are g: Quick-witted when it comes to skillful teachings
Readily memorize the teachings they’ve heard
Examine the meaning of teachings they’ve memorized
Understanding the meaning and the teaching, they practice accordingly
Don’t educate, encourage, fire up, and inspire their spiritual companions
Quick-witted when it comes to skillful teachings
Readily memorize the teachings they’ve heard
Don’t examine the meaning of teachings they’ve memorized
Understanding the meaning and the teaching, they don’t practice accordingly
Educate, encourage, fire up, and inspire their spiritual companions
Three qualities of a mendicant that are: Not quick-witted when it comes to skillful teachings
Readily memorize the teachings they’ve heard
Examine the meaning of teachings they’ve memorized
Understanding the meaning and the teaching, they practice accordingly
Don’t educate, encourage, fire up, and inspire their spiritual companions
Not quick-witted when it comes to skillful teachings
Readily memorize the teachings they’ve heard
Don’t examine the meaning of teachings they’ve memorized
Understanding the meaning and the teaching, they don’t practice accordingly
Educate, encourage, fire up, and inspire their spiritual companions
Two qualities of a mendicant that are go: Not quick-witted when it comes to skillful teachings
Don’t readily memorize the teachings they’ve heard
Examine the meaning of teachings they’ve memorized
Understanding the meaning and the teaching, they practice accordingly
Don’t educate, encourage, fire up, and inspire their spiritual companions

Don’t readily memorize the teachings they’ve heard
Don’t examine the meaning of teachings they’ve memorized
